description: Hearty chilli con carne is always a crowd pleaser, best served with guacamole and all the trimmings.
keywords: Beef dishes,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Mince,Egg free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Beef & Kidney Bean Chilli Con Carne Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red capsicum, cored and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: In a large frying pan on a medium high heat, drizzle the oil and cook the onion, capsicum, garlic and spices for 5 minutes until softened. Increase the heat to high, add the mince, break up with a spoon and cook for 5-7 minutes until nicely browned.
Pour in the kidney beans (including the liquid in the can) and cook for a further minute, stirring to combine.
Add the chopped tomatoes and beef stock and simmer for 20-25 minutes until reduced and thickened.
Serve the chilli with lime wedges, jalapenos, guacamole and rice.
